channel.title: Items in shops
channel.description: I recently made a new shop. The problem is that whenever someone buys them, their money doesn't go down. It's quite annoying since people are just spam buying from the shops and ruining the little economy my pking server has. Could anyone help with this problem?

item.title: Items in shops
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

Check the item values in item.cfg

Hope I helped!
~Leo.

Read full topic

item.title: Items in shops
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

i see 2 things here.

first would be that your item prices are set to 0

second is your buy value which in my opinion is - 0%

Read full topic
